desc.name: Make websites for clients based on React and .Net Core/Django.
Wordpress websites and bug fixes were also done.
Worked on Flutter to make apps for Android/iOS.
Used GitHub for Continuous Integration and Deployment.
This is a website for students to take exams and prepare for various standardized tests.
This is the tech stack that we have used for this project: Vue.js, Django and PostgreSQL.
Google Cloud Platform is used to host this project.

Conduct content audits to identify gaps and redundancies in the site content.
Conduct keyword research and use SEO guidelines to optimize content.
Promote content on social networks and monitor engagement (e.g. comments and shares).
Prepare well-structured drafts using digital publishing platforms.
Create and distribute marketing copy to advertise our company and products.
Edit and proofread written pieces before publication.
